ModMetaData.name: Positively's AdMech Armoury patch
ModMetaData.author: PositivelyAcademical
ModMetaData.description:
A quick patch to fix certain stats in Adeptus Mechanicus: Armoury.
An as yet unconfirmed mod is conflicting with Adeptus Mechanicus: Armoury, causing certain stats to be changed. Stats this mod resets include: + list stats here
